PROGRAMS

With so many MBA institutes and programs available, it is easy to lose sight of what the students and the industry really need. With its refreshing legacy of closely associating with the industry to understand their expectations from MBA graduates, International Institute of Management Science has crafted MBA programs that are rich in content and up-to-date with respect to industry operations.

The MBA programs at IIMS are affiliated to the University of Pune and thus come with a stamp of excellence. The institute offers a mix of full-time MBA courses as well as MCA & Ph.D courses in different management verticals.

KEY BENIFITS

  • High standards of academics ably supported by a team of experienced faculty
  • Value added modules with course curriculum certified by University of Pune
  • A well-equipped library with reputed national and international publications
  • State of the art Wi-Fi lab for accessing global knowledge libraries
  • Focus on balancing academic learning with extra-curricular pursuits
  • Excellent record of on-campus placement with reputed industry names
  • Internship opportunities with leading employers from different sectors
  • A growing alumni base that is creating a network of success in industry

    • ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA

    MBA Eligibility Criteria

    • The Candidate should be an Indian National
    • Passed minimum Three year duration Bachelor’s Degree awarded by the University recognized by University Grants Commission or Association of Indian Universities in any discipline with at least 50% marks in aggregate or equivalent (at least 45% in case of candidates of backward class categories and Persons With Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) or its equivalent.
    • Obtained non zero positive score in one of the following examinations; CET conducted by the Competent Authority (MAHMBA/MMS- CET), CAT, CMAT valid for admissions.

    MCA Eligibility Criteria

    • The Candidate should be an Indian National
    • Passed minimum Three year duration Bachelor’s Degree awarded by the University recognized by University Grants Commission or Association of Indian Universities in any science or engineering stream (at least 45% in case of candidates of backward class categories and Persons With Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) or its equivalent.
    • Must have 12th or graduation level with Mathematics
    • Obtained non zero positive score in one of the following examinations; CET conducted by the Competent Authority (MAHMBA/MMS- CET), CAT, CMAT valid for admissions.

    Ph.d Eligibility Criteria

    • Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU) offers a PhD with a minimum of 3 years and a maximum of 6 years duration.
    • Aspirants must have an aggregate of 55% marks in Master’s degree (5% relaxation for reserved/PwD). Candidates are shortlisted on the basis of PET examination score for Ph.D. admissions.
    • The candidate is exempted from the entrance exam if qualified in UGC-NET or M.Phil degree holders from SPPU.

    OUTLINE OF SYLLABUS

    SEMESTER 1

    GENERIC CORE COURSES

  • Accounting for Business Decisions
  • Legal Aspects of Business
  • Organizational Behaviour
  • Economic Analysis for Business Decisions
  • Business Research Methods
  • Basics of Marketing

    • GENERIC ELECTIVE COURSES

  • Management Fundamentals
  • Selling & Negotiation Skills Lab
  • Enterprise Analysis – Desk Research
  • Business Communication Lab
  • Leadership Lab
    • SEMESTER 2

    GENERIC CORE COURSES

  • Marketing Management
  • Human Resource Management
  • Operations & Supply Chain Management
  • Financial Management
  • Decision Science
  • Management Information Systems

    • GENERIC ELECTIVE COURSES

  • Life Skills Lab
  • Business Systems & Procedures
  • Industry Analysis – Desk Research
  • Geopolitics & the World Economic System
  • Computer Aided Personal Productivity Tools lab
    • SEMESTER 3

    GENERIC CORE COURSES

  • Strategic Management
  • Startup and New Venture Management
  • Enterprise Performance Management
    • SEMESTER 4

    GENERIC CORE COURSES

  • Managing for Sustainability
  • Dissertation

    • IIMS

    An ISO 9001 certified institute and approved by AICTE, IIMS has a lot to offer to MBA aspirants. Get in touch with us to know more.
    020-302-22114 | 020-652-07151
    DOWNLOAD BROCHURE
    HOW TO APPLY?

    ABOUT IIMS

    International Institute of Management Science or IIMS as it is popularly known, was founded in 2008 as a part of the Yashaswi Education Society. With a vibrant campus at Chinchwad, IIMS has not only a created name for itself through its high academic standards of management education but has become a sought-after place for the industry to recruit from. With a great learning environment and modern infrastructure, IIMS is a wonderful place for aspiring management graduates.

    IIMS offers full-time MBA and post graduate diploma courses affiliated to Pune University. The institute was awarded ISO 9001 Accreditation by the Auditing Body British Standards Institute in October 2009 in recognition of the Quality Systems put in place by us.

    FROM DIRECTOR’S DESK

    “Embracing both (industry-specific and discipline-specific) specialisation streams, the curriculum focuses on oriented-learning, thus creating a knowledge-base through experience.”
    – Dr. Shivaji D. Mundhe

    Goal-setting, Academic excellence, Holistic personal development and an ardent desire to be the best in the corporate world will create business leaders of tomorrow. At IIMS, we aim to provide this very platform for the students to launch their careers in the corporate world.

    The curriculum embraces both industry-specific and discipline-specific specialisation streams. For placements, the students are groomed through various activities such as industry presentations, interactive sessions, mentorship programmes, and value addition programmes besides regular studies. I welcome you to holistic learning at IIMS.

    Faculty

    While the curriculum at IIMS is the result of a well-researched process, it is our faculty that helps the students in making the most of this curriculum. A team of highly qualified, experienced and passionate teachers ensures that the students get to attend classroom session that sow the seeds for further learning. At IIMS, permanent and visiting faculty combine their academic and industry understanding to deliver masterclasses in education. With global exposure to support their knowledge, the students of IIMS have always been exposed to exceptional on-campus learning.

    DR.SHIVAJI D. MUNDHE

    Director

    PROF. DR. PUSHPRAJ WAGH

    Assistant Professor, Marketing

    PROF. MAHESH MAHANKAL

    Assistant Professor, Finance

    PROF. PAVAN SHARMA

    Assistant Professor, General Management

    MRS. ADITI CHIPLUNKAR

    Admissions

    MR. ABHIJIT CHAVAN

    System Admin

    ABOUT YASHASWI

    Success is not a destination, it’s a series of milestones that takes you ahead in life and ensures that you become an achiever. Handholding you on this journey across milestones is Yashaswi Group, in 23 states across India.

    Founded in 1981 by Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni, Yashaswi Group – through its 13 institutes – caters to different aspects of training and skill development, through management and technical education. The idea is to empower the youth through education and engage them with meaningful employment opportunities, so that they move towards success, while contributing to nation building. Through its multiple industry and government tie-ups, Yashaswi has positively impacted the loves of more than 80,000 students. The Group is associated with more than 900 reputed and emerging industry names, across the fields of Engineering, Pharma, Supply Chain & Logistics, Healthcare, Banking & Finance, Food, Retail and more.

    PLACEMENTS

    When students get access to great education, they set their ambitions higher than others. With the holistic education at IIMS, the MBA & MCA graduates seek job opportunities where they can make a difference with their learnings, which are a combination of academic and industry intelligence.

    IIMS has a glowing legacy of great on-campus placements for its students. Over the years, IIMS has become a preferred institute of recruitment for many leading names from different industry sectors.

    From Accenture and Hexaware in the IT sector, to Schneider, Aditya Birla Group and Syntel, many top industry names have hired and continue to place their trust in the students of IIMS.

    PLACEMENT REPORTS

    At IIMS, we believe in maintain complete transparency about the institute’s operations and activities. Here’s a compilation of our annual placement reports, which continue to improve and make us proud.

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2017-18

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2015-16

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2013-14

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2011-12

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2016-17

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2014-15

    PLACEMENT REPORTS 2012-13

    KEY RECRUITERS

    Founded in 2008, IIMS has developed a bond of trust with many leading industry names from different sectors. Over the years, these leading industry names have become key recruiters at IIMS. The impressive knowledge and the ambitions of the students of IIMS are the reason for this continued association.

    Here are some of the famous global and national brands that have forged a close association with IIMS and have many IIMS alumni working with them.

    AXIS BANK

    MARICO

    SYNTEL

    TECH MAHINDRA

    FORCE MOTORS

    PIDILITE

    TATA TELESERVICES LTD

    ITC LTD

    LIFE @ IIMS

    While classroom learning is at the heart of student grooming and growth at IIMS, the institute understands the importance of building more rounded personalities that will take the students further in the professional lives.

    As a result, the institute encourages and organises different activities that allow the students to express themselves freely while exploring and developing the different facets of their personalities.

    IIMS balances cultural and sports activities to ensure an all-round development of the students. This includes various events like sports competitions, cultural extravaganza, outbound excursions, Dandiya and Dahi Handi celebrations and more.

    INFRASTRUCTURE

    In addition to an excellent curriculum and an experienced faculty, IIMS is well-equipped with modern infrastructure that creates the perfect environment to facilitate high quality learning for the students. The IIMS campus offers various facilities for the students.

    From a well-equipped library to Wi-Fi lab and from spacious classrooms to a well-equipped auditorium, everything that enhances the learning experience, is available at IIMS.

    LIBRARY

    A well-stocked library of national and international journals and publications

    AUDITORIUM

    A well-equipped auditorium to conduct seminars, workshops and other course related activities

    IT INFRASTRUCTURE & RESOURCES

    A state-of-the-art Wi-Fi lab allows students to access online resources with extreme ease

    CAFETERIA AND MESS

    A spacious and vibrant cafeteria space which serves hygienic and delicious food for the students

    HEALTH CARE

    An on-campus first aid service and proximity to reputed hospitals, ensures well-being of the students

    MANDATORY DISCLOUSERS

    SPPU AFFILATION

    AICTE MANDATORY DISCLOUSERS

    DTE RECOGNITION

    SSS FEES

    REPORT ANTI RAGGING

    WOMENS GRIVENECE COMMITEE

    NAAC

    At IIMS, the curriculum, faculties, teaching methods and campus infrastructure are updated to meet the modern standards of learning. In fact, the courses at IIMS are certified by National Accreditation and Assessment Council, the apex body that certifies all courses in the country. Here are the different criteria and parameters that NAAC has certified IIMS on.

    IIQA

    SSR
